sitting_room.speaker: Narrator
sitting_room.text: The old sitting room is lit by candlelight. Mother sits in grandmother's chair, an ancient book in her lap. Your dragon curls at her feet as if it belongs there.

mother_begins.speaker: Mother
mother_begins.text: Our family name... do you know what it means? In the old tongue, it means 'Dragon's Heart.'

mother_history.speaker: Mother
mother_history.text: *She opens the ancient book* Three hundred years ago, our ancestor, Elara, was a healer. During the Dragon Wars, she found a wounded dragon - the last of its kind in our region.

mother_elara.speaker: Mother
mother_elara.text: Rather than turn it in for the bounty, she healed it. Hid it. And in doing so, formed a bond that changed our bloodline forever.

player_react.speaker: Narrator
player_react.text: Your dragon makes a low, resonant sound - almost like recognition.

choices.text: That's why we've always had this cafe...

mother_bond.speaker: Mother
mother_bond.text: The dragon, grateful for her kindness, shared something with Elara - a piece of its essence. From that day forward, every generation of our family has been able to bond with dragons.

mother_cafe.speaker: Mother
mother_cafe.text: *She nods* Elara built this very cafe as a sanctuary. A place where dragons and humans could exist together, away from those who would harm them.

mother_skip.speaker: Mother
mother_skip.text: But the gift doesn't always manifest. Sometimes it skips generations. Your grandmother didn't have it. I didn't have it. But you...

mother_you.speaker: Mother
mother_you.text: *Her voice trembles* The moment I held you, I felt it. That reaching, that longing. You were born to bond with dragons.

mother_egg.speaker: Mother
mother_egg.text: The egg in the cellar... it's been there for over a century, waiting. Dragons choose their bonded. It was waiting for YOU.

dragon_rises.speaker: Narrator
dragon_rises.text: Your dragon rises and moves to stand beside you. In this moment, you feel the full weight of your connection - ancient, profound, and unbreakable.

mother_illness.speaker: Mother
mother_illness.text: My illness... it was the burden of keeping this secret. Of watching you grow incomplete, knowing what you needed but afraid to give it to you.

mother_apologizes.speaker: Mother
mother_apologizes.text: *Tears stream down her face* When you bonded with your dragon and took your rightful place here, the weight lifted from me. I could finally breathe again.

player_comfort.speaker: Narrator
player_comfort.text: You move to embrace your mother. Your dragon wraps a wing around you both.

choices.text: I understand, Mother. You were trying to protect me.
Thank you for finally telling me the truth.

mother_grateful.speaker: Mother
mother_grateful.text: *She holds you tight* You are the heir to a beautiful legacy, my child. The line of Dragon's Heart continues with you.

end_scene.speaker: Narrator
end_scene.text: For the first time in your life, you understand who you are. The empty spaces inside you were never emptiness at all - they were spaces waiting to be filled by this moment, this truth, this dragon beside you.
